description: Inflation is reaching deeper into the British economy, the bank said, as businesses raise prices and workers seek higher pay.

description: The Dow dropped more than 700 points on Friday morning after a key inflation report missed estimates and showed a higher-than-anticipated increase in the price of consumer goods.
title: The Dow plummets as inflation hits 40-year high

description: Record gas prices drove inflation to 8.6% for 12 months ending in May, higher than the pace in April, according to the latest Consumer Price Index. CNN's Christine Romans reports.
title: 'Tough number to swallow': Romans breaks down inflation data
